title: Sports
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Men's College Hoops Spotlight: Rebuilding, Villanova Eyes NCAA Tournament Berth
items.description: Villanova nearly taking down UConn showed the Wildcats' growth this season, writes FOX Sports' Michael Cohen.

items.title: Indiana Coach Darian DeVries on Purdue Upset: 'These Types of Rivalries are Fun'
items.description: After Indiana upset No. 12 Purdue, Hoosiers head coach Darian DeVries discussed how "great" the in-state rivalry is.

items.title: Women's College Hoops Spotlight: Georgetown Coach Praises 'Best' UConn Team
items.description: FOX Sports' Laken Litman breaks down Georgetown coach Darnell Haney's eyebrow-raising comments after UConn throttled his team.

items.title: Mensah commits to Miami after Duke settlement
items.description: Darian Mensah and Duke have agreed to a settlement of their dispute that cleared the way for the quarterback's transfer to Miami.

items.title: Broncos fire OC Lombardi after falling short of SB
items.description: Broncos offensive coordinator Joe Lombardi was fired Tuesday along with wide receivers coach Keary Colbert and cornerbacks coach Addison Lynch.

items.title: Sources: Belichick not a 1st-ballot Hall of Famer
items.description: Bill Belichick, the eight-time Super Bowl-winning coach, will not be a first-ballot Hall of Famer, sources told ESPN.

items.title: Rodman, Hayes viral celebration caps off U.S. rout
